title: Apply orange & navy Ankara-print hero background for a more African-themed homepage

requirements.text: Generate a new hero background image that visually resembles an orange and navy-blue Ankara (African print) fabric pattern and add it as a static asset under frontend/public/assets/generated.

quotes: Design the background with orange and navy blue print Ankara fabric design to make the app look more African themed

acceptanceCriteria: A new image file exists at frontend/public/assets/generated/hero-bg-ankara-orange-navy-print.dim_2400x1350.png
The image is a seamless-looking Ankara-inspired fabric print with a dominant orange + navy palette and high visual contrast suitable for a hero background

requirements.text: Update the homepage hero background fallback so that when no admin-uploaded hero image is configured, the hero section uses the generated Ankara background image as the default background (while keeping existing overlay/opacity behavior for readability).

quotes: Design the background with orange and navy blue print Ankara fabric design to make the app look more African themed

acceptanceCriteria: If adminConfig.homepageVisuals.heroImage is not set, the HomePage hero renders with background image /assets/generated/hero-bg-ankara-orange-navy-print.dim_2400x1350.png
If adminConfig.homepageVisuals.heroImage is set, the uploaded image continues to take precedence (no regression)
Hero text remains readable due to the existing overlay color + opacity logic

requirements.text: Keep all existing admin controls for homepage visuals (image upload, overlay color, overlay opacity, and gradient/color field) working so the logo and text remain editable and the background can still be changed by admins after this update.

quotes: Design the background with orange and navy blue print Ankara fabric design to make the app look more African themed

acceptanceCriteria: Admins can still upload a hero background image from the Admin Dashboard and see it on the homepage hero after saving
Admins can still adjust overlay color/opacity and see the effect on the homepage hero
No user-facing text is changed away from English as part of this update

constraints: Do not modify files under frontend/src/components/ui (read-only components).
Do not modify frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts, frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.tsx, frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts, or frontend/src/main.tsx (immutable paths).
Backend remains single-actor; no backend changes are required for this request.
nonGoals: Changing backend data models or performing state migrations.
Adding new admin UI for selecting from multiple built-in background presets (only update the default fallback behavior).
Changing non-hero areas of the site (admin dashboard visuals, video cards, quiz UI) beyond what is necessary to support the new hero background asset.

required: Ankara-inspired fabric print background with dominant orange and navy colors, high-contrast geometric motifs (hero-bg-ankara-orange-navy-print.dim_2400x1350.png)
